title: #176: The Race To Net Zero
description:
The COP26 climate summit is underway in Glasgow, Scotland and the leaders of the world are passionately discussing how to save humanity from carbon dioxide, while simultaneously flying into the event on 400 private jets.

The hypocrisy doesn’t end there, as the billionaire class proceeds to lecture the rest of the world about the things that they must change about their lives in order to save the world, while the Biden administration arrives on Air Force One with an 85-car motorcade.

The average person will never notice the similarities between the hysterics of the COVID Cult and that of the coming Climate Congregation, but those that are paying attention will see the signs well in advance, and they won’t be surprised at all.
